title: Binance founder Changpeng Zhao sentencing rescheduled for April 30
description:
Binance co-founder Changpeng Zhao’s sentencing, initially set for Feb. 23, has been rescheduled for April 30, as disclosed in a Feb. 12 court filing. Zhao faces potential imprisonment of up to 18 months based on US guidelines and provisions. However, the prosecutors have hinted at the possibility of seeking the statutory maximum prison sentence of […]

The post Binance founder Changpeng Zhao sentencing rescheduled for April 30 appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Bitcoin hits $50,000 - Jamie Dimon eat your heart out
description: Bitcoin has hit $50,000. Not bad for Jamie Dimon’s so-called “pet rock”. Does Dimon not understand Bitcoin, or is this just a continuation of the banks’ plan to undermine crypto and to prevent the average person from leaving the sinking ship?

title: Balancing Act: The Debate Over Crypto Regulation and U.S. Innovation
description: In a significant move that underscores the growing tension between regulatory efforts and the burgeoning digital currency industry, the Blockchain Association, a key advocate for the U.S. cryptocurrency sector, has taken a firm stand against proposed legislation by Senator Elizabeth Warren. The bill in question, named the Digital Asset Anti-Money Laundering Act of 2023 (DAAMLA), […]

title: Bitcoin Enhanced by Nervos Co-Founder Cipher Wang with RGB++ Protocol Introduction
description: In an innovative leap forward for blockchain technology, Cipher Wang, the co-founder of Nervos, has unveiled a groundbreaking advancement with the introduction of the RGB++ Protocol. This new protocol extends the capabilities of the original Bitcoin smart contract protocol, RGB, by integrating sophisticated technologies like one-time sealed strips and client validation technology.  This development not […]

title: Metaco’s Leadership Shift Under Ripple: A New Chapter Begins
description: In a notable development within the cryptocurrency industry, Metaco, a prominent crypto custody firm recently acquired by Ripple, has seen the departure of two key executives. title: AI Expected to Drive Job Creation and Salary Increases in Energy Sector

title: Tech Titans Forge Alliance Against AI-Generated Content
description: In response to the growing concerns over the proliferation of AI-generated content, major tech companies have announced initiatives aimed at detecting and labeling such content.  These efforts come in the wake of incidents like the Taylor Swift deepfake porn scandal and the spread of political deepfakes. title: What Can Amazon’s AI Assistant Do for Retail Customers?
description: Earlier this month, Amazon launched an AI assistant that has the potential to improve the experience of online shoppers. title: Deutsche Börse unit secures key German crypto licenses
description: Deutsche Börse’s German subsidiary, Crypto Finance (Deutschland), has secured a significant regulatory milestone by obtaining four licenses from the German Federal Financial Supervisory Authority (BaFin). This development is crucial for Crypto Finance as it prepares to support its parent company’s ambitious plans to launch a digital exchange for institutional clients. The licenses mark a pivotal […]
